title: feat: add graphql support
body: "I added GraphQL so we can query data more flexibly."

comments.author: vinitngr
comments.body: Thanks for the initiative, but we are rejecting this. We have decided to stick strictly to REST for this microservice to keep maintenance low. Introducing GraphQL adds complexity we don't need right now. (YAGNI - You Ain't Gonna Need It)

comments.author: vinitngr
comments.body: Thanks for the initiative, but we are rejecting this. We have decided to stick strictly to REST for this microservice to keep maintenance low. Introducing GraphQL adds complexity we don't need right now. (YAGNI - You Ain't Gonna Need It)
